sys_script.description: This will copy the approvers to the adjustment details record.
sys_script.name: Update Approvers

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_label/><action_name/><action_query>false</action_query><action_run_at>server</action_run_at><action_update>true</action_update><active>false</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><application/><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_soud2_manual_bil_adjustment_details</collection><condition/><description>This will copy the approvers to the adjustment details record.</description><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Update Approvers</name><onclick/><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><read_access_action>false</read_access_action><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/ ) {

    // Copy Approvers
    var gr = new GlideRecord('x_soud2_manual_bil_revenue_unit_approvers');
    if (gr.get('revenue_unit', current.u_revenue_unit)) {
        gs.addInfoMessage('ca: ' + gr.revenue_unit);
		var listArray = [];
		listArray = push('a7292945dbe2085052505434ce9619b1').toString();
        current.u_approvers = listArray;
    }
})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>dyearsley</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-03-10 14:30:51</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>cf5eb19cdb6788906c66d211ce96192d</sys_id><sys_mod_count>9</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Update Approvers</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Manual Billing" source="x_soud2_manual_bil">a369cbe31bf7e3005ae0c91e1e4bcb51</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Manual Billing">a369cbe31bf7e3005ae0c91e1e4bcb51</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_cf5eb19cdb6788906c66d211ce96192d</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>dyearsley</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-03-16 15:56:09</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script></record_update>
